Disease.Name: PEDIATRIC CATARACT [DD]
Disease.Summary: Pediatric cataract is one of the major causes of preventable childhood blindness (congenital, developmental, traumatic).;60% of pediatric cataracts are idiopathic. ;Genetically based cataracts account for 8%-29% [Anaga Medsinge, 2015];Approximately 50% of all congenital cataract cases max have a genentic cause [Deng H 2014] .
